initialBlock.becomeInvestorSubtitle: Free educational bot for novices in investing.
initialBlock.youGet: After going through all chapters on investment basics, you'll get the
initialBlock.startYourPortfolio: to start your portfolio after the Bakksy launch!

EducationDivisionBlock.bukksyEducationDevision: Hey, it's the Bakksy Education Division here!
EducationDivisionBlock.takledWithNovice: We've talked with novice investors, addressed their issues, and understood that this educational bot is a burning necessity.
EducationDivisionBlock.learnCanHard: Learning can be hard, we know. Especially when it comes to learning about investment.
EducationDivisionBlock.createdBotForYou: That's why we've created this bot for you to sort out the investment in the most simple and easy-to-grasp format - an educational bot in Telegram or Facebook messenger!

LearnPlanBlock.fromAmount: From what amount to start? If you start, then for what period should you invest?
LearnPlanBlock.mainPlayers: The main players on the stock market. Risk and profit.
LearnPlanBlock.youTheNext: Are you the next Warren Buffet?
LearnPlanBlock.ourGoal: Our goal is to teach you how to invest so you know not only how to save your money but also how to increase your capital. We won't tell you how to make all the money in the world in one day, but we'll show you how to invest safely and long-term.
LearnPlanBlock.personRunning: A person running with a briefcase, representing investing.

certificateBlock.weWantLearn: We want you not only to learn but to act. And apply your newly acquired knowledge straight away.
certificateBlock.whyWeGive: That's why we give you a secret free stock!
certificateBlock.itWillBecome: It will become a starting point of your portfolio and path to financial freedom. You will see it in your portfolio right after the Bakksy launch.

InvestmentJourneyBlock.GetReadyFor: Get ready for your investment journey!
InvestmentJourneyBlock.EducationBot: with our education bot that splits complex investment knowledge into small pithy pieces for novices and skilled investors.
InvestmentJourneyBlock.WeKnow: We know learning can be hard. That's why we created the most convenient educational bot that explains complex concepts in plain language.
InvestmentJourneyBlock.9Chapters: 9 chapters, 1 final test. Everything you need to prepare for your investment journey, learn investment basics, and apply knowledge right away.
InvestmentJourneyBlock.KnowledgeIsNotEverything: Knowledge is not everything you'll get after successfully completing this education. You'll also get the free stock to start your portfolio once the app is launched.
InvestmentJourneyBlock.AndGetReady: And get ready to become financially literate and consciously create your first, perfectly balanced, and diversified portfolio just after the upcoming Bakksy launch.

aboutBotBlock.youNeedThis: You need this bot if you:

aboutBotBlock.differenceBetween: the difference between stocks and ETFs

quizBlock.stillHave: Still have doubts whether you need this?
quizBlock.ifYouThink: If you think that you already know everything you need, take our investment test.
quizBlock.theVariability: It's the variability of the price on the market
quizBlock.dividingTheMoney: Dividing the money between different assets

aboutBakksyBlock.bakksyIsAn: Bakksy is an investment app for novices that is about to rock the world of finance and investment.
aboutBakksyBlock.atBakksyWe: At Bakksy, we truly believe that all people should have access to financial freedom. To do that, we have to deal with two essential tasks:
aboutBakksyBlock.createTheApp: Create the app with the best investment experience
aboutBakksyBlock.BecauseOnlyBy: Because only by making wise and conscious investment decisions can you win in the long-term and receive financial independence. So use our educational bot to get started and prepare for the greatest investment journey with Bakksy!

footer.bakksyIsTrading: Bakksy is a trading name of Bakksy Finance OÜ, which is a registered in Estonia by address Tornimäe 3, Tallinn 10145 (No. 16575205).
